findings.title: RRS - Redundant Require Statement
findings.description: The `require` statement is redundant and can be removed.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The SafeMath library is not needed and adds complexity, overhead, and gas consumption.

findings.title: MEM - Misleading Error Messages
findings.description: The error messages are misleading and do not accurately reflect the problem.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables can be declared as immutable to save gas and improve efficiency.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant to improve efficiency and reduce gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly can be error-prone and should be carefully tested and debugged.
